description: Pun on Elvis Presley's song, 'caught in a trap'.
title: Elvis Leaves the Building
n_1: Marty discovers Elvis motionless near a mouse trap.
c1_1: Oh no, Elvis! Not the trap!
c1_2: You always loved a good challenge.
n_3: A friend joins Marty, noticing his sadness.
n_4: They both smile, remembering Elvis's quirks.
c1_4: He was always caught in a trap!
